abstracts.cdata!:
The primary objectives of the project
            are to: (a) strengthen the managerial capabilities of GWSC
            to enable it to play an effective role in planning and
            carrying out rehabilitation and further development of the
            water and sewerage sector; (b) improve GWSC's operating
            and financial performance; and (c) improve water supply in
            the Accra/Tema Metropolitan Area by carrying out emergency
            repair and maintenance of the transmission and distribution
            facilities. The project would include: (a) a management
            improvement program for GWSC including a comprehensive
            review by consultants of GWSC's organization,
            management, operating and financial policies, staffing and
            manpower development and provision of about 30 man-years of
            technical assistance to strengthen GWSC's higher level
            staff and to assist in implementing the consultants'
            recommendations; (b) emergency rehabilitation of the
            Kpong-Tema-Accra pipeline and provision of spares, supplies
            and equipment urgently required to carry out repairs and
            maintenance of the distribution network in the Accra/Tema
            Metropolitan Area including installation and repair of
            public standpipes; and (c) preparation of final engineering
            design and contract documents for a future investment in
            water supply and sanitation.
